item.title: About this blog
item.description: Maciej (Matthew) Morycinski retired from being an industrial automation technologist, to pursue creative interests. Born in Poland, he now lives in Canada, in the province of British Columbia, city of Burnaby. His blog aims to entertain, educate, provoke reflection. You can e-mail him at: m at tt dot moryce dot caThanks for reading! Comments are not yet enabled. Please use the above email.
